actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to allow civilian employees of the Department of Defense in overseas areas to receive routine dental care in military facilities where adequate civilian facilities are unavailable.

summary.text: Allows civilian employees of the Department of Defense stationed outside the United States and their dependents to receive routine dental care in military facilities where adequate civilian facilities are unavailable.

titles.title: A bill to allow civilian employees of the Department of Defense in overseas areas to receive routine dental care in military facilities where adequate civilian facilities are unavailable.
